=head2 Miscellaneous

=head3 Prefers 24 hour time?

No

=head3 Local first day of the week

7 (आदि वारा)

=head2 Strftime Patterns

=head3 %c (%a %b %e %H:%M:%S %Y) - date time format

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = मान्गा माहा  5 18:30:30 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = सुकुरु पान्डे 22 09:05:02 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = सान्नि बाॅदो 15 04:44:23 -10

=head3 %x (%m/%d/%y) - date format

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 02/05/08
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12/22/95
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 09/15/10

=head3 %X (%H:%M:%S) - time format

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23

=head1 SUPPORT

See L<DateTime::Locale>.
